original_title: If You Give a Dance, You Gotta Pay the Band
overview: Life in a black ghetto isn't easy for 14-year-old Billie Jean Sims, who has a father in jail, a blind grandmother, and a brother with a drug habit. Growing up among drug pushers, prostitutes, and pimps, Billie Jean still has some things going for her: fierce pride, a loyal friend named Fish, and, at last, enough savings to visit her father 1200 miles away in prison.
tagline: The story of ghetto boy and girl trying to raise money for the girl to visit her father in prison.
title: If You Give a Dance, You Gotta Pay the Band
